data.lyric:
[ti:Last Hurrah (Acoustic)]
[ar:Bebe Rexha]
[al:Last Hurrah (Acoustic)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Last Hurrah (Acoustic) - Bebe Rexha
[00:05.49]Lyrics by：Bleta Rexha/Lauren Christy/Andrew Wells/Nick Long
[00:10.98]I'm done with the drinking
[00:12.42]I'm done with the smoking
[00:13.86]I'm done with the playing
[00:15.22]I'm done with the joking
[00:16.68]I'm done with the ladies
[00:17.98]I'm done with the fellas
[00:19.93]Just sayin'
[00:21.16]Yeah
[00:22.30]Farewell tequila so long margarita
[00:25.05]And lady sativa I hate to leave ya
[00:27.89]Don't want the pressure
[00:29.16]I don't need a lecture
[00:31.36]No thank you honey God bless ya
[00:33.97]And I know I've said it all before
[00:39.20]But it won't hurt to do it all once more
[00:43.77]This is my last hurrah once I start
[00:47.25]I ain't gonna stop 'til I go too far
[00:49.97]Last hurrah and it's okay
[00:52.71]Maybe tomorrow I won't feel this pain
[00:55.44]Last hurrah
[01:00.93]Last hurrah
[01:06.46]I'm done with the heartache
[01:07.82]I'm done with the demons
[01:09.14]Can't wait to be normal
[01:10.56]Right after this weekend
[01:11.95]I'm done with the drama
[01:13.45]I'm fixing my karma
[01:15.49]One more night of pure nirvana
[01:18.34]I know I've said it all before
[01:23.41]But it won't hurt to do it all once more
[01:28.06]This is my last hurrah once I start
[01:31.41]I ain't gonna stop 'til I go too far
[01:34.15]Last hurrah and it's okay
[01:37.08]Maybe tomorrow I won't feel this pain
[01:39.67]Last hurrah
[01:45.16]Last hurrah
[01:50.75]Maybe I'll never change
[01:53.52]But I'm still glad I came
[01:56.25]Try again another day
[01:59.11]But for now
[02:01.24]This is my last hurrah once I start
[02:04.63]I ain't gonna stop 'til I go too far
[02:07.36]Last hurrah and it's okay
[02:10.15]Maybe tomorrow I won't feel this pain
[02:12.84]Last hurrah
[02:18.31]Last hurrah
data.trans:
[ti:最后的狂欢 (Acoustic)]
[ar:Bebe Rexha]
[al:最后的狂欢 (Acoustic)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.49]//
[00:10.98]我受够了借酒浇愁
[00:12.42]我也不愿烟不离手
[00:13.86]我厌倦了嬉笑玩弄
[00:15.22]我受够了所谓玩笑
[00:16.68]我受够了所谓淑女
[00:17.98]我厌倦了那些男人
[00:19.93]只是说说而已
[00:21.16]//
[00:22.30]再见了 龙舌兰酒 永别了 玛格丽特
[00:25.05]还有尼古丁啊 真不想放弃你
[00:27.89]不想被施加压力
[00:29.16]我无需由人说教
[00:31.36]不 谢谢 亲爱的 上帝保佑你
[00:33.97]我知道我早就信誓旦旦承诺过
[00:39.20]即便再来一次也无妨
[00:43.77]这是我最后的狂欢 一旦开始
[00:47.25]我将永不停歇 直到最后一刻
[00:49.97]最后的狂欢 没关系
[00:52.71]或许明天 心底的伤痛就会不药而愈
[00:55.44]最后的狂欢
[01:00.93]最后的狂欢
[01:06.46]我受够了心碎难过
[01:07.82]我厌倦了恶魔歹念
[01:09.14]迫不及待想在这周之后
[01:10.56]做一个正常人
[01:11.95]我受够了无休止的闹剧
[01:13.45]我接受命运因果循环的安排
[01:15.49]又一个涅槃重生的夜晚
[01:18.34]我知道我早就信誓旦旦承诺过
[01:23.41]即便再来一次也无妨
[01:28.06]这是我最后的狂欢 一旦开始
[01:31.41]我将永不停歇 直到最后一刻
[01:34.15]最后的狂欢 没关系
[01:37.08]或许明天 心底的伤痛就会不药而愈
[01:39.67]最后的狂欢
[01:45.16]最后的狂欢
[01:50.75]也许我永远都不会改变
[01:53.52]但我仍为自己的尝试高兴
[01:56.25]改天再尝试着改变吧
[01:59.11]但此刻
[02:01.24]这是我最后的狂欢 一旦开始
[02:04.63]我将永不停歇 直到最后一刻
[02:07.36]最后的狂欢 没关系
[02:10.15]或许明天 心底的伤痛就会不药而愈
[02:12.84]最后的狂欢
[02:18.31]最后的狂欢
